summary: Adds many new Unique followers to the game
descriptionHtml:
This Mod Adds 20 completely new Followers with their own skills and combat styles.

My Goal is to create 100 new and unique followers as well as a huge player home to go with them.

Works well with follower wander the mod by: King Coin. Works well with follower map markers. Works well with amazing follower tweaks by Dheuster. Also works well with other mods which increase the amount of followers you can have at once.

The Followers can be found at The Dragon's Shield's, a new tavern located near Riverwood. Look at map image above.

If there are any comments, questions or ideas you have for me, please tell me in the comments below.

I will be constantly updating this mod to make sure you guys enjoy it.

Enjoy =)
author: cptnras
